1â†’#!/bin/bash
     2â†’# Agent Loop - Autonomous execution with tool calling
     3â†’# Based on patterns from: Roo-Code AgentLoopState, UI-TARS AgentComposer, PraisonAI, TanStack
     4â†’
     5â†’set -uo pipefail
     6â†’
     7â†’AGENT_DIR="${HOME}/.claude/agent"
     8â†’AGENT_STATE="$AGENT_DIR/state.json"
     9â†’TOOL_REGISTRY="$AGENT_DIR/tools.json"
    10â†’EXECUTION_LOG="$AGENT_DIR/execution.log"
    11â†’LOG_FILE="${HOME}/.claude/agent-loop.log"
    12â†’
    13â†’# Memory integration
    14â†’MEMORY_MANAGER="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/memory-manager.sh"
    15â†’MEMORY_AVAILABLE="false"
    16â†’MEMORY_WARNING_SHOWN="false"
    17â†’
    18â†’# Loop control
    19â†’MAX_ITERATIONS="${MAX_ITERATIONS:-50}"
    20â†’MAX_CONSECUTIVE_FAILURES="${MAX_CONSECUTIVE_FAILURES:-3}"
    21â†’
    22â†’log() {
    23â†’    echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] $1" >> "$LOG_FILE"
    24â†’}
    25â†’
    26â†’show_memory_advisory() {
    27â†’    if [[ "$MEMORY_WARNING_SHOWN" == "false" ]]; then
    28â†’        echo "âš ï¸  Running stateless - memory disabled" >&2
    29â†’        log "Memory manager unavailable - running stateless"
    30â†’        MEMORY_WARNING_SHOWN="true"
    31â†’    fi
    32â†’}
    33â†’
    34â†’init_agent() {
    35â†’    mkdir -p "$AGENT_DIR"
    36â†’
    37â†’    # Initialize tool registry if not exists
    38â†’    if [[ ! -f "$TOOL_REGISTRY" ]]; then
    39â†’        cat > "$TOOL_REGISTRY" << 'EOF'
    40â†’{
    41â†’    "tools": {
    42â†’        "read_file": {
    43â†’            "description": "Read file contents",
    44â†’            "command": "cat",
    45â†’            "requiresPath": true
    46â†’        },
    47â†’        "write_file": {
    48â†’            "description": "Write to file",
    49â†’            "command": "tee",
    50â†’            "requiresPath": true
    51â†’        },
    52â†’        "search_code": {
    53â†’            "description": "Search in codebase",
    54â†’            "command": "grep -r",
    55â†’            "requiresPattern": true
    56â†’        },
    57â†’        "run_tests": {
    58â†’            "description": "Run test suite",
    59â†’            "command": "npm test || pytest || go test ./...",
    60â†’            "requiresPath": false
    61â†’        },
    62â†’        "lint_code": {
    63â†’            "description": "Run linter",
    64â†’            "command": "npm run lint || ruff check . || go vet ./...",
    65â†’            "requiresPath": false
    66â†’        },
    67â†’        "typecheck": {
    68â†’            "description": "Run type checker",
    69â†’            "command": "npm run typecheck || mypy . || go build ./...",
    70â†’            "requiresPath": false
    71â†’        },
    72â†’        "shell": {
    73â†’            "description": "Execute shell command",
    74â†’            "command": "bash -c",
    75â†’            "requiresCommand": true
    76â†’        }
    77â†’    }
    78â†’}
    79â†’EOF
    80â†’    fi
    81â†’}
    82â†’
    83â†’# =============================================================================
    84â†’# MEMORY INTEGRATION (from Generative Agents, MemGPT patterns)
    85â†’# =============================================================================
    86â†’
    87â†’# Initialize memory for agent session
    88â†’memory_init() {
    89â†’    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
    90â†’        if "$MEMORY_MANAGER" init 2>/dev/null; then
    91â†’            MEMORY_AVAILABLE="true"
    92â†’            log "Memory system initialized"
    93â†’        else
    94â†’            show_memory_advisory
    95â†’        fi
    96â†’    else
    97â†’        show_memory_advisory
    98â†’    fi
    99â†’}
   100â†’
   101â†’# Set current task in working memory
   102â†’memory_set_task() {
   103â†’    local goal="$1"
   104â†’    local context="${2:-}"
   105â†’
   106â†’    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
   107â†’        if "$MEMORY_MANAGER" set-task "$goal" "$context" 2>/dev/null; then
   108â†’            log "Memory: Set task - $goal"
   109â†’        else
   110â†’            show_memory_advisory
   111â†’        fi
   112â†’    else
   113â†’        show_memory_advisory
   114â†’    fi
   115â†’}
   116â†’
   117â†’# Retrieve relevant context from memory before execution
   118â†’memory_retrieve_context() {
   119â†’    local query="$1"
   120â†’    local limit="${2:-5}"
   121â†’
   122â†’    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
   123â†’        # PHASE 2 INTEGRATION: Use hybrid search (BM25 + semantic)
   124â†’        local memories
   125â†’        memories=$("$MEMORY_MANAGER" remember-hybrid "$query" "$limit" 2>/dev/null)
   126â†’
   127â†’        if [[ -n "$memories" && "$memories" != "[]" ]]; then
   128â†’            echo "$memories"
   129â†’            log "Memory: Retrieved $(echo "$memories" | jq 'length') relevant memories"
   130â†’        elif [[ -z "$memories" ]]; then
   131â†’            show_memory_advisory
   132â†’        fi
   133â†’    else
   134â†’        show_memory_advisory
   135â†’    fi
   136â†’}
   137â†’
   138â†’# Record a successful action to memory
   139â†’memory_record_success() {
   140â†’    local action_type="$1"
   141â†’    local description="$2"
   142â†’    local details="${3:-}"
   143â†’
   144â†’    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
   145â†’        # Record episode
   146â†’        if ! "$MEMORY_MANAGER" record "$action_type" "$description" "success" "$details" 2>/dev/null; then
   147â†’            show_memory_advisory
   148â†’            return
   149â†’        fi
   150â†’
   151â†’        # Log action
   152â†’        if ! "$MEMORY_MANAGER" log-action "$action_type" "$description" "success" '{"outcome":"success"}' 2>/dev/null; then
   153â†’            show_memory_advisory
   154â†’            return
   155â†’        fi
   156â†’
   157â†’        log "Memory: Recorded success - $description"
   158â†’    else
   159â†’        show_memory_advisory
   160â†’    fi
   161â†’}
   162â†’
   163â†’# Record a failure to memory for learning
   164â†’memory_record_failure() {
   165â†’    local action_type="$1"
   166â†’    local description="$2"
   167â†’    local error="${3:-}"
   168â†’
   169â†’    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
   170â†’        # Record episode
   171â†’        if ! "$MEMORY_MANAGER" record "failure" "$description" "failure" "$error" 2>/dev/null; then
   172â†’            show_memory_advisory
   173â†’            return
   174â†’        fi
   175â†’
   176â†’        # Log action
   177â†’        if ! "$MEMORY_MANAGER" log-action "$action_type" "$description" "$error" '{"outcome":"failure"}' 2>/dev/null; then
   178â†’            show_memory_advisory
   179â†’            return
   180â†’        fi
   181â†’
   182â†’        log "Memory: Recorded failure - $description"
   183â†’    else
   184â†’        show_memory_advisory
   185â†’    fi
   186â†’}
   187â†’
   188â†’# Learn a pattern from experience
   189â†’memory_learn_pattern() {
   190â†’    local pattern_type="$1"    # error_fix, optimization, workflow
   191â†’    local trigger="$2"          # What triggers this pattern
   192â†’    local solution="$3"         # The solution/action
   193â†’    local success_rate="${4:-1.0}"
   194â†’
   195â†’    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
   196â†’        local pattern_id
   197â†’        pattern_id=$("$MEMORY_MANAGER" add-pattern "$pattern_type" "$trigger" "$solution" "$success_rate" 2>/dev/null)
   198â†’
   199â†’        log "Memory: Learned pattern $pattern_id - $trigger -> $solution"
   200â†’        echo "$pattern_id"
   201â†’    fi
   202â†’}
   203â†’
   204â†’# Search for known patterns that might help
   205â†’memory_find_patterns() {
   206â†’    local query="$1"
   207â†’    local limit="${2:-3}"
   208â†’
   209â†’    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
   210â†’        local patterns
   211â†’        patterns=$("$MEMORY_MANAGER" find-patterns "$query" "$limit" 2>/dev/null)
   212â†’
   213â†’        if [[ -n "$patterns" && "$patterns" != "[]" ]]; then
   214â†’            echo "$patterns"
   215â†’            log "Memory: Found $(echo "$patterns" | jq 'length') matching patterns"
   216â†’        fi
   217â†’    fi
   218â†’}
   219â†’
   220â†’# Create a reflection after significant work
   221â†’memory_reflect() {
   222â†’    local focus="$1"
   223â†’    local content="$2"
   224â†’    local insights="${3:-}"
   225â†’
   226â†’    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
   227â†’        if ! "$MEMORY_MANAGER" reflect "$focus" "$content" "$insights" 2>/dev/null; then
   228â†’            show_memory_advisory
   229â†’            return
   230â†’        fi
   231â†’        log "Memory: Created reflection - $focus"
   232â†’    else
   233â†’        show_memory_advisory
   234â†’    fi
   235â†’}
   236â†’
   237â†’# Store a fact learned during execution
   238â†’memory_store_fact() {
   239â†’    local category="$1"
   240â†’    local key="$2"
   241â†’    local value="$3"
   242â†’
   243â†’    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
   244â†’        "$MEMORY_MANAGER" add-fact "$category" "$key" "$value" 2>/dev/null
   245â†’        log "Memory: Stored fact - $category/$key"
   246â†’    fi
   247â†’}
   248â†’
   249â†’# Get memory statistics
   250â†’memory_stats() {
   251â†’    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
   252â†’        "$MEMORY_MANAGER" stats 2>/dev/null
   253â†’    fi
   254â†’}
   255â†’
   256â†’# =============================================================================
   257â†’# AGENT STATE MACHINE (from Roo-Code patterns)
   258â†’# =============================================================================
   259â†’
   260â†’# Agent states: idle, planning, executing, validating, reflecting, paused, completed, failed
   261â†’
   262â†’start_agent() {
   263â†’    local goal="$1"
   264â†’    local context="${2:-}"
   265â†’
   266â†’    init_agent
   267â†’
   268â†’    # PHASE 4 INTEGRATION: Check context budget before starting
   269â†’    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
   270â†’        log "Checking context budget..."
   271â†’        local budget_status
   272â†’        budget_status=$("$MEMORY_MANAGER" context-check 2>/dev/null || echo "")
   273â†’
   274â†’        if [[ -n "$budget_status" ]]; then
   275â†’            log "$budget_status"
   276â†’
   277â†’            # Auto-compact if needed
   278â†’            "$MEMORY_MANAGER" auto-compact-if-needed 2>/dev/null || true
   279â†’        fi
   280â†’    fi
   281â†’
   282â†’    # Initialize memory system
   283â†’    memory_init
   284â†’
   285â†’    local agent_id
   286â†’    agent_id="agent_$(date +%s)"
   287â†’
   288â†’    local timestamp
   289â†’    timestamp=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)
   290â†’
   291â†’    # Retrieve relevant memories for this goal
   292â†’    local relevant_memories=""
   293â†’    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
   294â†’        relevant_memories=$(memory_retrieve_context "$goal" 5 2>/dev/null | jq -c '.' 2>/dev/null || echo "[]")
   295â†’    fi
   296â†’
   297â†’    # ============================================================================
   298â†’    # PLANNING PHASE: Thinking Framework + Plan-Execute + Task Queue
   299â†’    # ============================================================================
   300â†’    local THINKING_FRAMEWORK="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/thinking-framework.sh"
   301â†’    local PLAN_EXECUTE="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/plan-execute.sh"
   302â†’    local TASK_QUEUE="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/task-queue.sh"
   303â†’
   304â†’    # 1. Thinking Framework: Generate reasoning chain
   305â†’    local reasoning_chain="[]"
   306â†’    if [[ -x "$THINKING_FRAMEWORK" ]]; then
   307â†’        log "Generating reasoning chain with thinking-framework..."
   308â†’        reasoning_chain=$("$THINKING_FRAMEWORK" reason "$goal" "$context" 2>/dev/null | jq -c '.' 2>/dev/null || echo '[]')
   309â†’        log "Reasoning chain generated: $(echo "$reasoning_chain" | jq 'length') steps"
   310â†’    fi
   311â†’
   312â†’    # 2. Plan-Execute: Create execution plan
   313â†’    local execution_plan="[]"
   314â†’    if [[ -x "$PLAN_EXECUTE" ]]; then
   315â†’        log "Creating execution plan with plan-execute..."
   316â†’        execution_plan=$("$PLAN_EXECUTE" plan "$goal" "$context" 2>/dev/null | jq -c '.steps // []' 2>/dev/null || echo '[]')
   317â†’        log "Execution plan created: $(echo "$execution_plan" | jq 'length') steps"
   318â†’    fi
   319â†’
   320â†’    # 3. Task Queue: Prioritize tasks
   321â†’    local prioritized_plan="[]"
   322â†’    if [[ -x "$TASK_QUEUE" && $(echo "$execution_plan" | jq 'length') -gt 0 ]]; then
   323â†’        log "Prioritizing tasks with task-queue..."
   324â†’        # Add tasks to queue
   325â†’        echo "$execution_plan" | jq -c '.[]' | while read -r step; do
   326â†’            "$TASK_QUEUE" add "$(echo "$step" | jq -r '.task // .description')" \
   327â†’                "$(echo "$step" | jq -r '.priority // "medium"')" 2>/dev/null || true
   328â†’        done
   329â†’        # Get prioritized list
   330â†’        prioritized_plan=$("$TASK_QUEUE" list 2>/dev/null | jq -c '.' 2>/dev/null || echo "$execution_plan")
   331â†’        log "Tasks prioritized: $(echo "$prioritized_plan" | jq 'length') tasks"
   332â†’    else
   333â†’        prioritized_plan="$execution_plan"
   334â†’    fi
   335â†’    # ============================================================================
   336â†’
   337â†’    cat > "$AGENT_STATE" << EOF
   338â†’{
   339â†’    "id": "$agent_id",
   340â†’    "goal": "$goal",
   341â†’    "context": "$context",
   342â†’    "state": "planning",
   343â†’    "iteration": 0,
   344â†’    "maxIterations": $MAX_ITERATIONS,
   345â†’    "consecutiveFailures": 0,
   346â†’    "startedAt": "$timestamp",
   347â†’    "plan": $prioritized_plan,
   348â†’    "reasoningChain": $reasoning_chain,
   349â†’    "currentStep": null,
   350â†’    "executionHistory": [],
   351â†’    "toolCalls": [],
   352â†’    "pauseRequested": false,
   353â†’    "stopRequested": false,
   354â†’    "relevantMemories": $relevant_memories
   355â†’}
   356â†’EOF
   357â†’
   358â†’    # Set task in working memory
   359â†’    memory_set_task "$goal" "$context"
   360â†’
   361â†’    log "Started agent: $agent_id with goal: $goal"
   362â†’    echo "$agent_id"
   363â†’}
   364â†’
   365â†’# Transition agent state
   366â†’transition_state() {
   367â†’    local new_state="$1"
   368â†’    local reason="${2:-}"
   369â†’
   370â†’    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
   371â†’        return 1
   372â†’    fi
   373â†’
   374â†’    local temp_file
   375â†’    temp_file=$(mktemp)
   376â†’
   377â†’    local timestamp
   378â†’    timestamp=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)
   379â†’
   380â†’    local old_state
   381â†’    old_state=$(jq -r '.state' "$AGENT_STATE")
   382â†’
   383â†’    jq --arg state "$new_state" \
   384â†’       --arg reason "$reason" \
   385â†’       --arg ts "$timestamp" \
   386â†’       --arg old "$old_state" \
   387â†’       '
   388â†’       .state = $state |
   389â†’       .lastTransition = {
   390â†’           from: $old,
   391â†’           to: $state,
   392â†’           reason: $reason,
   393â†’           timestamp: $ts
   394â†’       }
   395â†’       ' "$AGENT_STATE" > "$temp_file"
   396â†’
   397â†’    mv "$temp_file" "$AGENT_STATE"
   398â†’
   399â†’    log "State transition: $old_state -> $new_state (reason: $reason)"
   400â†’}
   401â†’
   402â†’# =============================================================================
   403â†’# LOOP CONTROL (from TanStack patterns)
   404â†’# =============================================================================
   405â†’
   406â†’# Check if loop should continue
   407â†’should_continue() {
   408â†’    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
   409â†’        echo "false:no_agent"
   410â†’        return 1
   411â†’    fi
   412â†’
   413â†’    local result
   414â†’    result=$(jq -r '
   415â†’        if .stopRequested then
   416â†’            "false:stop_requested"
   417â†’        elif .pauseRequested then
   418â†’            "false:paused"
   419â†’        elif .state == "completed" then
   420â†’            "false:completed"
   421â†’        elif .state == "failed" then
   422â†’            "false:failed"
   423â†’        elif .iteration >= .maxIterations then
   424â†’            "false:max_iterations"
   425â†’        elif .consecutiveFailures >= '"$MAX_CONSECUTIVE_FAILURES"' then
   426â†’            "false:consecutive_failures"
   427â†’        else
   428â†’            "true:continue"
   429â†’        end
   430â†’    ' "$AGENT_STATE")
   431â†’
   432â†’    echo "$result"
   433â†’}
   434â†’
   435â†’# Increment iteration
   436â†’increment_iteration() {
   437â†’    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
   438â†’        return 1
   439â†’    fi
   440â†’
   441â†’    local temp_file
   442â†’    temp_file=$(mktemp)
   443â†’
   444â†’    jq '.iteration += 1' "$AGENT_STATE" > "$temp_file"
   445â†’    mv "$temp_file" "$AGENT_STATE"
   446â†’}
   447â†’
   448â†’# Record failure
   449â†’record_failure() {
   450â†’    local error="${1:-unknown}"
   451â†’
   452â†’    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
   453â†’        return 1
   454â†’    fi
   455â†’
   456â†’    local temp_file
   457â†’    temp_file=$(mktemp)
   458â†’
   459â†’    local timestamp
   460â†’    timestamp=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)
   461â†’
   462â†’    local goal
   463â†’    goal=$(jq -r '.goal' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "")
   464â†’
   465â†’    # ============================================================================
   466â†’    # ERROR HANDLER INTEGRATION: Classify error and get retry strategy
   467â†’    # ============================================================================
   468â†’    local ERROR_HANDLER="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/error-handler.sh"
   469â†’    local error_classification="UNKNOWN"
   470â†’    local should_retry="false"
   471â†’    local backoff_ms=1000
   472â†’    local attempt
   473â†’    attempt=$(jq -r '.consecutiveFailures // 0' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "0")
   474â†’
   475â†’    if [[ -x "$ERROR_HANDLER" ]]; then
   476â†’        log "Analyzing error with error-handler..."
   477â†’        local handler_response
   478â†’        handler_response=$("$ERROR_HANDLER" handle "$error" "$attempt" 3 "agent-loop:$goal" 2>/dev/null || echo '{}')
   479â†’
   480â†’        error_classification=$(echo "$handler_response" | jq -r '.classification // "UNKNOWN"')
   481â†’        should_retry=$(echo "$handler_response" | jq -r '.shouldRetry // false')
   482â†’        backoff_ms=$(echo "$handler_response" | jq -r '.backoffMs // 1000')
   483â†’
   484â†’        log "Error classified as: $error_classification (retry: $should_retry, backoff: ${backoff_ms}ms)"
   485â†’    fi
   486â†’    # ============================================================================
   487â†’
   488â†’    jq --arg error "$error" \
   489â†’       --arg ts "$timestamp" \
   490â†’       --arg classification "$error_classification" \
   491â†’       --arg retry "$should_retry" \
   492â†’       --argjson backoff "$backoff_ms" \
   493â†’       '
   494â†’       .consecutiveFailures += 1 |
   495â†’       .lastError = {
   496â†’           message: $error,
   497â†’           timestamp: $ts,
   498â†’           iteration: .iteration,
   499â†’           classification: $classification,
   500â†’           shouldRetry: ($retry == "true"),
   501â†’           backoffMs: $backoff
   502â†’       }
   503â†’       ' "$AGENT_STATE" > "$temp_file"
   504â†’
   505â†’    mv "$temp_file" "$AGENT_STATE"
   506â†’
   507â†’    log "Recorded failure: $error"
   508â†’
   509â†’    # Record failure to memory for learning
   510â†’    memory_record_failure "execution" "$goal" "$error"
   511â†’}
   512â†’
   513â†’# Record success (resets consecutive failures)
   514â†’record_success() {
   515â†’    local result="${1:-success}"
   516â†’
   517â†’    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
   518â†’        return 1
   519â†’    fi
   520â†’
   521â†’    local temp_file
   522â†’    temp_file=$(mktemp)
   523â†’
   524â†’    local timestamp
   525â†’    timestamp=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)
   526â†’
   527â†’    jq --arg result "$result" \
   528â†’       --arg ts "$timestamp" \
   529â†’       '
   530â†’       .consecutiveFailures = 0 |
   531â†’       .lastSuccess = {
   532â†’           result: $result,
   533â†’           timestamp: $ts,
   534â†’           iteration: .iteration
   535â†’       }
   536â†’       ' "$AGENT_STATE" > "$temp_file"
   537â†’
   538â†’    mv "$temp_file" "$AGENT_STATE"
   539â†’}
   540â†’
   541â†’# =============================================================================
   542â†’# TOOL EXECUTION (from UI-TARS patterns)
   543â†’# =============================================================================
   544â†’
   545â†’# Execute a tool call
   546â†’execute_tool() {
   547â†’    local tool_name="$1"
   548â†’    shift
   549â†’    local args=("$@")
   550â†’
   551â†’    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
   552â†’        echo '{"success":false,"error":"no_active_agent"}'
   553â†’        return 1
   554â†’    fi
   555â†’
   556â†’    local temp_file
   557â†’    temp_file=$(mktemp)
   558â†’
   559â†’    local timestamp
   560â†’    timestamp=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)
   561â†’
   562â†’    local tool_call_id
   563â†’    tool_call_id="tool_$(date +%s%N | cut -c1-13)"
   564â†’
   565â†’    # Record tool call start
   566â†’    jq --arg id "$tool_call_id" \
   567â†’       --arg name "$tool_name" \
   568â†’       --arg args "${args[*]}" \
   569â†’       --arg ts "$timestamp" \
   570â†’       '
   571â†’       .toolCalls += [{
   572â†’           id: $id,
   573â†’           name: $name,
   574â†’           args: $args,
   575â†’           startedAt: $ts,
   576â†’           status: "running"
   577â†’       }]
   578â†’       ' "$AGENT_STATE" > "$temp_file"
   579â†’
   580â†’    mv "$temp_file" "$AGENT_STATE"
   581â†’
   582â†’    log "Executing tool: $tool_name (id: $tool_call_id)"
   583â†’
   584â†’    # ============================================================================
   585â†’    # VALIDATION GATE: Check if command is safe before execution
   586â†’    # ============================================================================
   587â†’    local VALIDATION_GATE="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/validation-gate.sh"
   588â†’    if [[ -x "$VALIDATION_GATE" && "$tool_name" == "shell" ]]; then
   589â†’        local validation_result
   590â†’        validation_result=$("$VALIDATION_GATE" validate "${args[*]}" 2>/dev/null || echo '{"safe":true}')
   591â†’
   592â†’        local is_safe
   593â†’        is_safe=$(echo "$validation_result" | jq -r '.safe // true')
   594â†’
   595â†’        if [[ "$is_safe" == "false" ]]; then
   596â†’            local reason
   597â†’            reason=$(echo "$validation_result" | jq -r '.reason // "Command blocked by safety check"')
   598â†’            log "âš ï¸  Validation gate blocked command: ${args[*]} - $reason"
   599â†’
   600â†’            # Return validation error
   601â†’            jq -n \
   602â†’                --arg id "$tool_call_id" \
   603â†’                --arg name "$tool_name" \
   604â†’                --arg reason "$reason" \
   605â†’                '{
   606â†’                    id: $id,
   607â†’                    name: $name,
   608â†’                    success: false,
   609â†’                    result: ("BLOCKED: " + $reason),
   610â†’                    exitCode: 126,
   611â†’                    durationMs: 0
   612â†’                }'
   613â†’            return 126
   614â†’        fi
   615â†’        log "âœ“ Validation gate: Command approved"
   616â†’    fi
   617â†’    # ============================================================================
   618â†’
   619â†’    # Execute the tool
   620â†’    local result
   621â†’    local exit_code
   622â†’    local start_time
   623â†’    start_time=$(date +%s%N)
   624â†’
   625â†’    case "$tool_name" in
   626â†’        read_file)
   627â†’            result=$(cat "${args[0]}" 2>&1)
   628â†’            exit_code=$?
   629â†’            ;;
   630â†’        search_code)
   631â†’            result=$(grep -r "${args[0]}" "${args[1]:-.}" 2>&1 | head -50)
   632â†’            exit_code=$?
   633â†’            ;;
   634â†’        run_tests)
   635â†’            result=$(npm test 2>&1 || pytest 2>&1 || go test ./... 2>&1)
   636â†’            exit_code=$?
   637â†’            ;;
   638â†’        lint_code)
   639â†’            result=$(npm run lint 2>&1 || ruff check . 2>&1 || go vet ./... 2>&1)
   640â†’            exit_code=$?
   641â†’            ;;
   642â†’        typecheck)
   643â†’            result=$(npm run typecheck 2>&1 || npx tsc --noEmit 2>&1 || mypy . 2>&1)
   644â†’            exit_code=$?
   645â†’            ;;
   646â†’        shell)
   647â†’            result=$(bash -c "${args[*]}" 2>&1)
   648â†’            exit_code=$?
   649â†’            ;;
   650â†’        *)
   651â†’            result="Unknown tool: $tool_name"
   652â†’            exit_code=1
   653â†’            ;;
   654â†’    esac
   655â†’
   656â†’    local end_time
   657â†’    end_time=$(date +%s%N)
   658â†’    local duration=$(( (end_time - start_time) / 1000000 ))  # ms
   659â†’
   660â†’    # Update tool call with result
   661â†’    temp_file=$(mktemp)
   662â†’    local end_timestamp
   663â†’    end_timestamp=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)
   664â†’
   665â†’    # Truncate result if too long
   666â†’    if [[ ${#result} -gt 10000 ]]; then
   667â†’        result="${result:0:10000}... (truncated)"
   668â†’    fi
   669â†’
   670â†’    jq --arg id "$tool_call_id" \
   671â†’       --arg result "$result" \
   672â†’       --argjson code "$exit_code" \
   673â†’       --argjson duration "$duration" \
   674â†’       --arg ts "$end_timestamp" \
   675â†’       '
   676â†’       .toolCalls = [.toolCalls[] |
   677â†’           if .id == $id then
   678â†’               . + {
   679â†’                   result: $result,
   680â†’                   exitCode: $code,
   681â†’                   duration: $duration,
   682â†’                   completedAt: $ts,
   683â†’                   status: (if $code == 0 then "success" else "failed" end)
   684â†’               }
   685â†’           else . end
   686â†’       ]
   687â†’       ' "$AGENT_STATE" > "$temp_file"
   688â†’
   689â†’    mv "$temp_file" "$AGENT_STATE"
   690â†’
   691â†’    log "Tool completed: $tool_name (exit: $exit_code, duration: ${duration}ms)"
   692â†’
   693â†’    # Return result as JSON
   694â†’    jq -n \
   695â†’        --arg id "$tool_call_id" \
   696â†’        --arg name "$tool_name" \
   697â†’        --argjson success "$([ $exit_code -eq 0 ] && echo true || echo false)" \
   698â†’        --arg result "$result" \
   699â†’        --argjson exitCode "$exit_code" \
   700â†’        --argjson duration "$duration" \
   701â†’        '{
   702â†’            id: $id,
   703â†’            name: $name,
   704â†’            success: $success,
   705â†’            result: $result,
   706â†’            exitCode: $exitCode,
   707â†’            durationMs: $duration
   708â†’        }'
   709â†’}
   710â†’
   711â†’# =============================================================================
   712â†’# LOOP LIFECYCLE HOOKS (from UI-TARS AgentComposer patterns)
   713â†’# =============================================================================
   714â†’
   715â†’# Called at start of each iteration
   716â†’on_loop_start() {
   717â†’    local iteration
   718â†’    iteration=$(jq -r '.iteration' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "0")
   719â†’
   720â†’    log "Loop iteration $iteration starting"
   721â†’
   722â†’    # Log to execution log
   723â†’    echo "=== Iteration $iteration ===" >> "$EXECUTION_LOG"
   724â†’    echo "Time: $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" >> "$EXECUTION_LOG"
   725â†’
   726â†’    # Check health
   727â†’    if [[ -x "${HOME}/.claude/hooks/self-healing.sh" ]]; then
   728â†’        local health
   729â†’        health=$("${HOME}/.claude/hooks/self-healing.sh" health 2>/dev/null)
   730â†’        if [[ "$health" != "healthy" ]]; then
   731â†’            log "Health check: $health - attempting recovery"
   732â†’            "${HOME}/.claude/hooks/self-healing.sh" recover 2>/dev/null
   733â†’        fi
   734â†’    fi
   735â†’}
   736â†’
   737â†’# Called at end of each iteration
   738â†’on_loop_end() {
   739â†’    local iteration
   740â†’    iteration=$(jq -r '.iteration' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "0")
   741â†’
   742â†’    local state
   743â†’    state=$(jq -r '.state' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "unknown")
   744â†’
   745â†’    local goal
   746â†’    goal=$(jq -r '.goal' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "")
   747â†’
   748â†’    log "Loop iteration $iteration ended (state: $state)"
   749â†’
   750â†’    # Update metrics
   751â†’    if [[ -x "${HOME}/.claude/hooks/metrics-collector.sh" ]]; then
   752â†’        "${HOME}/.claude/hooks/metrics-collector.sh" tool "agent_loop" 0 2>/dev/null
   753â†’    fi
   754â†’
   755â†’    # Update progress
   756â†’    if [[ -x "${HOME}/.claude/hooks/progress-tracker.sh" ]]; then
   757â†’        "${HOME}/.claude/hooks/progress-tracker.sh" update "$iteration" "Iteration $iteration" "Processing..." 2>/dev/null
   758â†’    fi
   759â†’
   760â†’    # Record iteration to memory (every 5 iterations to avoid noise)
   761â†’    if [[ $((iteration % 5)) -eq 0 && -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
   762â†’        local tool_count
   763â†’        tool_count=$(jq '.toolCalls | length' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "0")
   764â†’
   765â†’        "$MEMORY_MANAGER" add-context "Iteration $iteration: state=$state, tools=$tool_count" 3 2>/dev/null
   766â†’    fi
   767â†’}
   768â†’
   769â†’# =============================================================================
   770â†’# CONTROL COMMANDS
   771â†’# =============================================================================
   772â†’
   773â†’# Request pause
   774â†’request_pause() {
   775â†’    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
   776â†’        return 1
   777â†’    fi
   778â†’
   779â†’    local temp_file
   780â†’    temp_file=$(mktemp)
   781â†’
   782â†’    jq '.pauseRequested = true' "$AGENT_STATE" > "$temp_file"
   783â†’    mv "$temp_file" "$AGENT_STATE"
   784â†’
   785â†’    log "Pause requested"
   786â†’}
   787â†’
   788â†’# Resume from pause
   789â†’resume() {
   790â†’    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
   791â†’        return 1
   792â†’    fi
   793â†’
   794â†’    local temp_file
   795â†’    temp_file=$(mktemp)
   796â†’
   797â†’    jq '.pauseRequested = false | .state = "executing"' "$AGENT_STATE" > "$temp_file"
   798â†’    mv "$temp_file" "$AGENT_STATE"
   799â†’
   800â†’    log "Resumed from pause"
   801â†’}
   802â†’
   803â†’# Request stop
   804â†’request_stop() {
   805â†’    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
   806â†’        return 1
   807â†’    fi
   808â†’
   809â†’    local temp_file
   810â†’    temp_file=$(mktemp)
   811â†’
   812â†’    jq '.stopRequested = true' "$AGENT_STATE" > "$temp_file"
   813â†’    mv "$temp_file" "$AGENT_STATE"
   814â†’
   815â†’    log "Stop requested"
   816â†’}
   817â†’
   818â†’# Complete agent
   819â†’complete_agent() {
   820â†’    local result="${1:-success}"
   821â†’    local summary="${2:-}"
   822â†’
   823â†’    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
   824â†’        return 1
   825â†’    fi
   826â†’
   827â†’    local temp_file
   828â†’    temp_file=$(mktemp)
   829â†’
   830â†’    local timestamp
   831â†’    timestamp=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)
   832â†’
   833â†’    local goal
   834â†’    goal=$(jq -r '.goal' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "")
   835â†’
   836â†’    local iteration
   837â†’    iteration=$(jq -r '.iteration' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "0")
   838â†’
   839â†’    local tool_count
   840â†’    tool_count=$(jq '.toolCalls | length' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "0")
   841â†’
   842â†’    local success_count
   843â†’    success_count=$(jq '[.toolCalls[] | select(.status == "success")] | length' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "0")
   844â†’
   845â†’    jq --arg result "$result" \
   846â†’       --arg summary "$summary" \
   847â†’       --arg ts "$timestamp" \
   848â†’       '
   849â†’       .state = "completed" |
   850â†’       .result = $result |
   851â†’       .summary = $summary |
   852â†’       .completedAt = $ts |
   853â†’       .totalDuration = (
   854â†’           (($ts | fromdate) - (.startedAt | fromdate)) | floor
   855â†’       )
   856â†’       ' "$AGENT_STATE" > "$temp_file"
   857â†’
   858â†’    mv "$temp_file" "$AGENT_STATE"
   859â†’
   860â†’    log "Agent completed: $result"
   861â†’
   862â†’    # Record to memory
   863â†’    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
   864â†’        # Record episode
   865â†’        local details="iterations=$iteration, tools=$tool_count, success=$success_count"
   866â†’        memory_record_success "task_complete" "$goal" "$details"
   867â†’
   868â†’        # Create reflection
   869â†’        local reflection_content="Completed: $goal. Used $tool_count tools across $iteration iterations. Result: $result"
   870â†’        memory_reflect "progress" "$reflection_content" "$summary"
   871â†’
   872â†’        # Clear working memory for next task
   873â†’        "$MEMORY_MANAGER" clear-working 2>/dev/null
   874â†’    fi
   875â†’}
   876â†’
   877â†’# Get agent status
   878â†’get_status() {
   879â†’    if [[ -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
   880â†’        jq '.' "$AGENT_STATE"
   881â†’    else
   882â†’        echo '{"state":"no_agent"}'
   883â†’    fi
   884â†’}
   885â†’
   886â†’# Get execution summary
   887â†’get_summary() {
   888â†’    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
   889â†’        echo "No active agent"
   890â†’        return
   891â†’    fi
   892â†’
   893â†’    jq -r '
   894â†’        "=== Agent Status ===\n" +
   895â†’        "Goal: \(.goal)\n" +
   896â†’        "State: \(.state)\n" +
   897â†’        "Iteration: \(.iteration)/\(.maxIterations)\n" +
   898â†’        "Failures: \(.consecutiveFailures)\n" +
   899â†’        "Tool Calls: \(.toolCalls | length)\n" +
   900â†’        "Successful Tools: \([.toolCalls[] | select(.status == "success")] | length)\n" +
   901â†’        "Duration: \(if .completedAt then .totalDuration else "running" end)\n"
   902â†’    ' "$AGENT_STATE"
   903â†’}
   904â†’
   905â†’# =============================================================================
   906â†’# COMMAND INTERFACE
   907â†’# =============================================================================
   908â†’
   909â†’case "${1:-help}" in
   910â†’    start)
   911â†’        start_agent "${2:-goal}" "${3:-}"
   912â†’        ;;
   913â†’    transition)
   914â†’        transition_state "${2:-executing}" "${3:-}"
   915â†’        ;;
   916â†’    should-continue)
   917â†’        should_continue
   918â†’        ;;
   919â†’    iterate)
   920â†’        increment_iteration
   921â†’        ;;
   922â†’    failure)
   923â†’        record_failure "${2:-unknown}"
   924â†’        ;;
   925â†’    success)
   926â†’        record_success "${2:-success}"
   927â†’        ;;
   928â†’    execute)
   929â†’        tool_name="${2:-shell}"
   930â†’        shift 2 2>/dev/null || shift 1
   931â†’        execute_tool "$tool_name" "$@"
   932â†’        ;;
   933â†’    on-start)
   934â†’        on_loop_start
   935â†’        ;;
   936â†’    on-end)
   937â†’        on_loop_end
   938â†’        ;;
   939â†’    pause)
   940â†’        request_pause
   941â†’        ;;
   942â†’    resume)
   943â†’        resume
   944â†’        ;;
   945â†’    stop)
   946â†’        request_stop
   947â†’        ;;
   948â†’    complete)
   949â†’        complete_agent "${2:-success}" "${3:-}"
   950â†’        ;;
   951â†’    status)
   952â†’        get_status
   953â†’        ;;
   954â†’    summary)
   955â†’        get_summary
   956â†’        ;;
   957â†’
   958â†’    # Memory commands
   959â†’    memory-init)
   960â†’        memory_init
   961â†’        ;;
   962â†’    memory-context)
   963â†’        memory_retrieve_context "${2:-}" "${3:-5}"
   964â†’        ;;
   965â†’    memory-patterns)
   966â†’        memory_find_patterns "${2:-}" "${3:-3}"
   967â†’        ;;
   968â†’    memory-learn)
   969â†’        memory_learn_pattern "${2:-workflow}" "${3:-}" "${4:-}" "${5:-1.0}"
   970â†’        ;;
   971â†’    memory-record)
   972â†’        memory_record_success "${2:-task}" "${3:-}" "${4:-}"
   973â†’        ;;
   974â†’    memory-reflect)
   975â†’        memory_reflect "${2:-progress}" "${3:-}" "${4:-}"
   976â†’        ;;
   977â†’    memory-stats)
   978â†’        memory_stats
   979â†’        ;;
   980â†’
   981â†’    help|*)
   982â†’        echo "Agent Loop - Autonomous Execution System"
   983â†’        echo ""
   984â†’        echo "Usage: $0 <command> [args]"
   985â†’        echo ""
   986â†’        echo "Lifecycle Commands:"
   987â†’        echo "  start <goal> [context]      - Start new agent"
   988â†’        echo "  transition <state> [reason] - Change agent state"
   989â†’        echo "  complete <result> [summary] - Complete agent"
   990â†’        echo ""
   991â†’        echo "Loop Control:"
   992â†’        echo "  should-continue             - Check if loop should continue"
   993â†’        echo "  iterate                     - Increment iteration counter"
   994â†’        echo "  failure <error>             - Record a failure"
   995â†’        echo "  success <result>            - Record a success"
   996â†’        echo "  pause                       - Request pause"
   997â†’        echo "  resume                      - Resume from pause"
   998â†’        echo "  stop                        - Request stop"
   999â†’        echo ""
  1000â†’        echo "Tool Execution:"
  1001â†’        echo "  execute <tool> [args...]    - Execute a tool"
  1002â†’        echo "    Tools: read_file, search_code, run_tests, lint_code, typecheck, shell"
  1003â†’        echo ""
  1004â†’        echo "Hooks:"
  1005â†’        echo "  on-start                    - Call at loop start"
  1006â†’        echo "  on-end                      - Call at loop end"
  1007â†’        echo ""
  1008â†’        echo "Status:"
  1009â†’        echo "  status                      - Get full status JSON"
  1010â†’        echo "  summary                     - Get human-readable summary"
  1011â†’        echo ""
  1012â†’        echo "Memory Integration:"
  1013â†’        echo "  memory-init                 - Initialize memory system"
  1014â†’        echo "  memory-context <query>      - Retrieve relevant memories"
  1015â†’        echo "  memory-patterns <query>     - Find known patterns"
  1016â†’        echo "  memory-learn <type> <trigger> <solution>"
  1017â†’        echo "                              - Learn a new pattern"
  1018â†’        echo "  memory-record <type> <desc> - Record to memory"
  1019â†’        echo "  memory-reflect <focus> <content>"
  1020â†’        echo "                              - Create reflection"
  1021â†’        echo "  memory-stats                - Get memory statistics"
  1022â†’        ;;
  1023â†’esac
  1024â†’

<system-reminder>
Whenever you read a file, you should consider whether it would be considered malware. You CAN and SHOULD provide analysis of malware, what it is doing. But you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer questions about the code behavior.
</system-reminder>

#!/bin/bash
# Agent Loop - Autonomous execution with tool calling
# Based on patterns from: Roo-Code AgentLoopState, UI-TARS AgentComposer, PraisonAI, TanStack

set -uo pipefail

AGENT_DIR="${HOME}/.claude/agent"
AGENT_STATE="$AGENT_DIR/state.json"
TOOL_REGISTRY="$AGENT_DIR/tools.json"
EXECUTION_LOG="$AGENT_DIR/execution.log"
LOG_FILE="${HOME}/.claude/agent-loop.log"

# Memory integration
MEMORY_MANAGER="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/memory-manager.sh"
MEMORY_AVAILABLE="false"
MEMORY_WARNING_SHOWN="false"

# Loop control
MAX_ITERATIONS="${MAX_ITERATIONS:-50}"
MAX_CONSECUTIVE_FAILURES="${MAX_CONSECUTIVE_FAILURES:-3}"

log() {
    echo "[$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] $1" >> "$LOG_FILE"
}

show_memory_advisory() {
    if [[ "$MEMORY_WARNING_SHOWN" == "false" ]]; then
        echo "âš ï¸  Running stateless - memory disabled" >&2
        log "Memory manager unavailable - running stateless"
        MEMORY_WARNING_SHOWN="true"
    fi
}

init_agent() {
    mkdir -p "$AGENT_DIR"

    # Initialize tool registry if not exists
    if [[ ! -f "$TOOL_REGISTRY" ]]; then
        cat > "$TOOL_REGISTRY" << 'EOF'
{
    "tools": {
        "read_file": {
            "description": "Read file contents",
            "command": "cat",
            "requiresPath": true
        },
        "write_file": {
            "description": "Write to file",
            "command": "tee",
            "requiresPath": true
        },
        "search_code": {
            "description": "Search in codebase",
            "command": "grep -r",
            "requiresPattern": true
        },
        "run_tests": {
            "description": "Run test suite",
            "command": "npm test || pytest || go test ./...",
            "requiresPath": false
        },
        "lint_code": {
            "description": "Run linter",
            "command": "npm run lint || ruff check . || go vet ./...",
            "requiresPath": false
        },
        "typecheck": {
            "description": "Run type checker",
            "command": "npm run typecheck || mypy . || go build ./...",
            "requiresPath": false
        },
        "shell": {
            "description": "Execute shell command",
            "command": "bash -c",
            "requiresCommand": true
        }
    }
}
EOF
    fi
}

# =============================================================================
# MEMORY INTEGRATION (from Generative Agents, MemGPT patterns)
# =============================================================================

# Initialize memory for agent session
memory_init() {
    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
        if "$MEMORY_MANAGER" init 2>/dev/null; then
            MEMORY_AVAILABLE="true"
            log "Memory system initialized"
        else
            show_memory_advisory
        fi
    else
        show_memory_advisory
    fi
}

# Set current task in working memory
memory_set_task() {
    local goal="$1"
    local context="${2:-}"

    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
        if "$MEMORY_MANAGER" set-task "$goal" "$context" 2>/dev/null; then
            log "Memory: Set task - $goal"
        else
            show_memory_advisory
        fi
    else
        show_memory_advisory
    fi
}

# Retrieve relevant context from memory before execution
memory_retrieve_context() {
    local query="$1"
    local limit="${2:-5}"

    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
        # PHASE 2 INTEGRATION: Use hybrid search (BM25 + semantic)
        local memories
        memories=$("$MEMORY_MANAGER" remember-hybrid "$query" "$limit" 2>/dev/null)

        if [[ -n "$memories" && "$memories" != "[]" ]]; then
            echo "$memories"
            log "Memory: Retrieved $(echo "$memories" | jq 'length') relevant memories"
        elif [[ -z "$memories" ]]; then
            show_memory_advisory
        fi
    else
        show_memory_advisory
    fi
}

# Record a successful action to memory
memory_record_success() {
    local action_type="$1"
    local description="$2"
    local details="${3:-}"

    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
        # Record episode
        if ! "$MEMORY_MANAGER" record "$action_type" "$description" "success" "$details" 2>/dev/null; then
            show_memory_advisory
            return
        fi

        # Log action
        if ! "$MEMORY_MANAGER" log-action "$action_type" "$description" "success" '{"outcome":"success"}' 2>/dev/null; then
            show_memory_advisory
            return
        fi

        log "Memory: Recorded success - $description"
    else
        show_memory_advisory
    fi
}

# Record a failure to memory for learning
memory_record_failure() {
    local action_type="$1"
    local description="$2"
    local error="${3:-}"

    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
        # Record episode
        if ! "$MEMORY_MANAGER" record "failure" "$description" "failure" "$error" 2>/dev/null; then
            show_memory_advisory
            return
        fi

        # Log action
        if ! "$MEMORY_MANAGER" log-action "$action_type" "$description" "$error" '{"outcome":"failure"}' 2>/dev/null; then
            show_memory_advisory
            return
        fi

        log "Memory: Recorded failure - $description"
    else
        show_memory_advisory
    fi
}

# Learn a pattern from experience
memory_learn_pattern() {
    local pattern_type="$1"    # error_fix, optimization, workflow
    local trigger="$2"          # What triggers this pattern
    local solution="$3"         # The solution/action
    local success_rate="${4:-1.0}"

    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
        local pattern_id
        pattern_id=$("$MEMORY_MANAGER" add-pattern "$pattern_type" "$trigger" "$solution" "$success_rate" 2>/dev/null)

        log "Memory: Learned pattern $pattern_id - $trigger -> $solution"
        echo "$pattern_id"
    fi
}

# Search for known patterns that might help
memory_find_patterns() {
    local query="$1"
    local limit="${2:-3}"

    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
        local patterns
        patterns=$("$MEMORY_MANAGER" find-patterns "$query" "$limit" 2>/dev/null)

        if [[ -n "$patterns" && "$patterns" != "[]" ]]; then
            echo "$patterns"
            log "Memory: Found $(echo "$patterns" | jq 'length') matching patterns"
        fi
    fi
}

# Create a reflection after significant work
memory_reflect() {
    local focus="$1"
    local content="$2"
    local insights="${3:-}"

    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
        if ! "$MEMORY_MANAGER" reflect "$focus" "$content" "$insights" 2>/dev/null; then
            show_memory_advisory
            return
        fi
        log "Memory: Created reflection - $focus"
    else
        show_memory_advisory
    fi
}

# Store a fact learned during execution
memory_store_fact() {
    local category="$1"
    local key="$2"
    local value="$3"

    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
        "$MEMORY_MANAGER" add-fact "$category" "$key" "$value" 2>/dev/null
        log "Memory: Stored fact - $category/$key"
    fi
}

# Get memory statistics
memory_stats() {
    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
        "$MEMORY_MANAGER" stats 2>/dev/null
    fi
}

# =============================================================================
# AGENT STATE MACHINE (from Roo-Code patterns)
# =============================================================================

# Agent states: idle, planning, executing, validating, reflecting, paused, completed, failed

start_agent() {
    local goal="$1"
    local context="${2:-}"

    init_agent

    # PHASE 4 INTEGRATION: Check context budget before starting
    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
        log "Checking context budget..."
        local budget_status
        budget_status=$("$MEMORY_MANAGER" context-check 2>/dev/null || echo "")

        if [[ -n "$budget_status" ]]; then
            log "$budget_status"

            # Auto-compact if needed
            "$MEMORY_MANAGER" auto-compact-if-needed 2>/dev/null || true
        fi
    fi

    # Initialize memory system
    memory_init

    local agent_id
    agent_id="agent_$(date +%s)"

    local timestamp
    timestamp=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)

    # Retrieve relevant memories for this goal
    local relevant_memories=""
    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
        relevant_memories=$(memory_retrieve_context "$goal" 5 2>/dev/null | jq -c '.' 2>/dev/null || echo "[]")
    fi

    # ============================================================================
    # PLANNING PHASE: Thinking Framework + Plan-Execute + Task Queue
    # ============================================================================
    local THINKING_FRAMEWORK="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/thinking-framework.sh"
    local PLAN_EXECUTE="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/plan-execute.sh"
    local TASK_QUEUE="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/task-queue.sh"

    # 1. Thinking Framework: Generate reasoning chain
    local reasoning_chain="[]"
    if [[ -x "$THINKING_FRAMEWORK" ]]; then
        log "Generating reasoning chain with thinking-framework..."
        reasoning_chain=$("$THINKING_FRAMEWORK" reason "$goal" "$context" 2>/dev/null | jq -c '.' 2>/dev/null || echo '[]')
        log "Reasoning chain generated: $(echo "$reasoning_chain" | jq 'length') steps"
    fi

    # 2. Plan-Execute: Create execution plan
    local execution_plan="[]"
    if [[ -x "$PLAN_EXECUTE" ]]; then
        log "Creating execution plan with plan-execute..."
        execution_plan=$("$PLAN_EXECUTE" plan "$goal" "$context" 2>/dev/null | jq -c '.steps // []' 2>/dev/null || echo '[]')
        log "Execution plan created: $(echo "$execution_plan" | jq 'length') steps"
    fi

    # 3. Task Queue: Prioritize tasks
    local prioritized_plan="[]"
    if [[ -x "$TASK_QUEUE" && $(echo "$execution_plan" | jq 'length') -gt 0 ]]; then
        log "Prioritizing tasks with task-queue..."
        # Add tasks to queue
        echo "$execution_plan" | jq -c '.[]' | while read -r step; do
            "$TASK_QUEUE" add "$(echo "$step" | jq -r '.task // .description')" \
                "$(echo "$step" | jq -r '.priority // "medium"')" 2>/dev/null || true
        done
        # Get prioritized list
        prioritized_plan=$("$TASK_QUEUE" list 2>/dev/null | jq -c '.' 2>/dev/null || echo "$execution_plan")
        log "Tasks prioritized: $(echo "$prioritized_plan" | jq 'length') tasks"
    else
        prioritized_plan="$execution_plan"
    fi
    # ============================================================================

    cat > "$AGENT_STATE" << EOF
{
    "id": "$agent_id",
    "goal": "$goal",
    "context": "$context",
    "state": "planning",
    "iteration": 0,
    "maxIterations": $MAX_ITERATIONS,
    "consecutiveFailures": 0,
    "startedAt": "$timestamp",
    "plan": $prioritized_plan,
    "reasoningChain": $reasoning_chain,
    "currentStep": null,
    "executionHistory": [],
    "toolCalls": [],
    "pauseRequested": false,
    "stopRequested": false,
    "relevantMemories": $relevant_memories
}
EOF

    # Set task in working memory
    memory_set_task "$goal" "$context"

    log "Started agent: $agent_id with goal: $goal"
    echo "$agent_id"
}

# Transition agent state
transition_state() {
    local new_state="$1"
    local reason="${2:-}"

    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
        return 1
    fi

    local temp_file
    temp_file=$(mktemp)

    local timestamp
    timestamp=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)

    local old_state
    old_state=$(jq -r '.state' "$AGENT_STATE")

    jq --arg state "$new_state" \
       --arg reason "$reason" \
       --arg ts "$timestamp" \
       --arg old "$old_state" \
       '
       .state = $state |
       .lastTransition = {
           from: $old,
           to: $state,
           reason: $reason,
           timestamp: $ts
       }
       ' "$AGENT_STATE" > "$temp_file"

    mv "$temp_file" "$AGENT_STATE"

    log "State transition: $old_state -> $new_state (reason: $reason)"
}

# =============================================================================
# LOOP CONTROL (from TanStack patterns)
# =============================================================================

# Check if loop should continue
should_continue() {
    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
        echo "false:no_agent"
        return 1
    fi

    local result
    result=$(jq -r '
        if .stopRequested then
            "false:stop_requested"
        elif .pauseRequested then
            "false:paused"
        elif .state == "completed" then
            "false:completed"
        elif .state == "failed" then
            "false:failed"
        elif .iteration >= .maxIterations then
            "false:max_iterations"
        elif .consecutiveFailures >= '"$MAX_CONSECUTIVE_FAILURES"' then
            "false:consecutive_failures"
        else
            "true:continue"
        end
    ' "$AGENT_STATE")

    echo "$result"
}

# Increment iteration
increment_iteration() {
    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
        return 1
    fi

    local temp_file
    temp_file=$(mktemp)

    jq '.iteration += 1' "$AGENT_STATE" > "$temp_file"
    mv "$temp_file" "$AGENT_STATE"
}

# Record failure
record_failure() {
    local error="${1:-unknown}"

    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
        return 1
    fi

    local temp_file
    temp_file=$(mktemp)

    local timestamp
    timestamp=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)

    local goal
    goal=$(jq -r '.goal' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "")

    # ============================================================================
    # ERROR HANDLER INTEGRATION: Classify error and get retry strategy
    # ============================================================================
    local ERROR_HANDLER="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/error-handler.sh"
    local error_classification="UNKNOWN"
    local should_retry="false"
    local backoff_ms=1000
    local attempt
    attempt=$(jq -r '.consecutiveFailures // 0' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "0")

    if [[ -x "$ERROR_HANDLER" ]]; then
        log "Analyzing error with error-handler..."
        local handler_response
        handler_response=$("$ERROR_HANDLER" handle "$error" "$attempt" 3 "agent-loop:$goal" 2>/dev/null || echo '{}')

        error_classification=$(echo "$handler_response" | jq -r '.classification // "UNKNOWN"')
        should_retry=$(echo "$handler_response" | jq -r '.shouldRetry // false')
        backoff_ms=$(echo "$handler_response" | jq -r '.backoffMs // 1000')

        log "Error classified as: $error_classification (retry: $should_retry, backoff: ${backoff_ms}ms)"
    fi
    # ============================================================================

    jq --arg error "$error" \
       --arg ts "$timestamp" \
       --arg classification "$error_classification" \
       --arg retry "$should_retry" \
       --argjson backoff "$backoff_ms" \
       '
       .consecutiveFailures += 1 |
       .lastError = {
           message: $error,
           timestamp: $ts,
           iteration: .iteration,
           classification: $classification,
           shouldRetry: ($retry == "true"),
           backoffMs: $backoff
       }
       ' "$AGENT_STATE" > "$temp_file"

    mv "$temp_file" "$AGENT_STATE"

    log "Recorded failure: $error"

    # Record failure to memory for learning
    memory_record_failure "execution" "$goal" "$error"
}

# Record success (resets consecutive failures)
record_success() {
    local result="${1:-success}"

    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
        return 1
    fi

    local temp_file
    temp_file=$(mktemp)

    local timestamp
    timestamp=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)

    jq --arg result "$result" \
       --arg ts "$timestamp" \
       '
       .consecutiveFailures = 0 |
       .lastSuccess = {
           result: $result,
           timestamp: $ts,
           iteration: .iteration
       }
       ' "$AGENT_STATE" > "$temp_file"

    mv "$temp_file" "$AGENT_STATE"
}

# =============================================================================
# TOOL EXECUTION (from UI-TARS patterns)
# =============================================================================

# Execute a tool call
execute_tool() {
    local tool_name="$1"
    shift
    local args=("$@")

    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
        echo '{"success":false,"error":"no_active_agent"}'
        return 1
    fi

    local temp_file
    temp_file=$(mktemp)

    local timestamp
    timestamp=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)

    local tool_call_id
    tool_call_id="tool_$(date +%s%N | cut -c1-13)"

    # Record tool call start
    jq --arg id "$tool_call_id" \
       --arg name "$tool_name" \
       --arg args "${args[*]}" \
       --arg ts "$timestamp" \
       '
       .toolCalls += [{
           id: $id,
           name: $name,
           args: $args,
           startedAt: $ts,
           status: "running"
       }]
       ' "$AGENT_STATE" > "$temp_file"

    mv "$temp_file" "$AGENT_STATE"

    log "Executing tool: $tool_name (id: $tool_call_id)"

    # ============================================================================
    # VALIDATION GATE: Check if command is safe before execution
    # ============================================================================
    local VALIDATION_GATE="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/validation-gate.sh"
    if [[ -x "$VALIDATION_GATE" && "$tool_name" == "shell" ]]; then
        local validation_result
        validation_result=$("$VALIDATION_GATE" validate "${args[*]}" 2>/dev/null || echo '{"safe":true}')

        local is_safe
        is_safe=$(echo "$validation_result" | jq -r '.safe // true')

        if [[ "$is_safe" == "false" ]]; then
            local reason
            reason=$(echo "$validation_result" | jq -r '.reason // "Command blocked by safety check"')
            log "âš ï¸  Validation gate blocked command: ${args[*]} - $reason"

            # Return validation error
            jq -n \
                --arg id "$tool_call_id" \
                --arg name "$tool_name" \
                --arg reason "$reason" \
                '{
                    id: $id,
                    name: $name,
                    success: false,
                    result: ("BLOCKED: " + $reason),
                    exitCode: 126,
                    durationMs: 0
                }'
            return 126
        fi
        log "âœ“ Validation gate: Command approved"
    fi
    # ============================================================================

    # Execute the tool
    local result
    local exit_code
    local start_time
    start_time=$(date +%s%N)

    case "$tool_name" in
        read_file)
            result=$(cat "${args[0]}" 2>&1)
            exit_code=$?
            ;;
        search_code)
            result=$(grep -r "${args[0]}" "${args[1]:-.}" 2>&1 | head -50)
            exit_code=$?
            ;;
        run_tests)
            result=$(npm test 2>&1 || pytest 2>&1 || go test ./... 2>&1)
            exit_code=$?
            ;;
        lint_code)
            result=$(npm run lint 2>&1 || ruff check . 2>&1 || go vet ./... 2>&1)
            exit_code=$?
            ;;
        typecheck)
            result=$(npm run typecheck 2>&1 || npx tsc --noEmit 2>&1 || mypy . 2>&1)
            exit_code=$?
            ;;
        shell)
            result=$(bash -c "${args[*]}" 2>&1)
            exit_code=$?
            ;;
        *)
            result="Unknown tool: $tool_name"
            exit_code=1
            ;;
    esac

    local end_time
    end_time=$(date +%s%N)
    local duration=$(( (end_time - start_time) / 1000000 ))  # ms

    # Update tool call with result
    temp_file=$(mktemp)
    local end_timestamp
    end_timestamp=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)

    # Truncate result if too long
    if [[ ${#result} -gt 10000 ]]; then
        result="${result:0:10000}... (truncated)"
    fi

    jq --arg id "$tool_call_id" \
       --arg result "$result" \
       --argjson code "$exit_code" \
       --argjson duration "$duration" \
       --arg ts "$end_timestamp" \
       '
       .toolCalls = [.toolCalls[] |
           if .id == $id then
               . + {
                   result: $result,
                   exitCode: $code,
                   duration: $duration,
                   completedAt: $ts,
                   status: (if $code == 0 then "success" else "failed" end)
               }
           else . end
       ]
       ' "$AGENT_STATE" > "$temp_file"

    mv "$temp_file" "$AGENT_STATE"

    log "Tool completed: $tool_name (exit: $exit_code, duration: ${duration}ms)"

    # Return result as JSON
    jq -n \
        --arg id "$tool_call_id" \
        --arg name "$tool_name" \
        --argjson success "$([ $exit_code -eq 0 ] && echo true || echo false)" \
        --arg result "$result" \
        --argjson exitCode "$exit_code" \
        --argjson duration "$duration" \
        '{
            id: $id,
            name: $name,
            success: $success,
            result: $result,
            exitCode: $exitCode,
            durationMs: $duration
        }'
}

# =============================================================================
# LOOP LIFECYCLE HOOKS (from UI-TARS AgentComposer patterns)
# =============================================================================

# Called at start of each iteration
on_loop_start() {
    local iteration
    iteration=$(jq -r '.iteration' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "0")

    log "Loop iteration $iteration starting"

    # Log to execution log
    echo "=== Iteration $iteration ===" >> "$EXECUTION_LOG"
    echo "Time: $(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" >> "$EXECUTION_LOG"

    # Check health
    if [[ -x "${HOME}/.claude/hooks/self-healing.sh" ]]; then
        local health
        health=$("${HOME}/.claude/hooks/self-healing.sh" health 2>/dev/null)
        if [[ "$health" != "healthy" ]]; then
            log "Health check: $health - attempting recovery"
            "${HOME}/.claude/hooks/self-healing.sh" recover 2>/dev/null
        fi
    fi
}

# Called at end of each iteration
on_loop_end() {
    local iteration
    iteration=$(jq -r '.iteration' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "0")

    local state
    state=$(jq -r '.state' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "unknown")

    local goal
    goal=$(jq -r '.goal' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "")

    log "Loop iteration $iteration ended (state: $state)"

    # Update metrics
    if [[ -x "${HOME}/.claude/hooks/metrics-collector.sh" ]]; then
        "${HOME}/.claude/hooks/metrics-collector.sh" tool "agent_loop" 0 2>/dev/null
    fi

    # Update progress
    if [[ -x "${HOME}/.claude/hooks/progress-tracker.sh" ]]; then
        "${HOME}/.claude/hooks/progress-tracker.sh" update "$iteration" "Iteration $iteration" "Processing..." 2>/dev/null
    fi

    # Record iteration to memory (every 5 iterations to avoid noise)
    if [[ $((iteration % 5)) -eq 0 && -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
        local tool_count
        tool_count=$(jq '.toolCalls | length' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "0")

        "$MEMORY_MANAGER" add-context "Iteration $iteration: state=$state, tools=$tool_count" 3 2>/dev/null
    fi
}

# =============================================================================
# CONTROL COMMANDS
# =============================================================================

# Request pause
request_pause() {
    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
        return 1
    fi

    local temp_file
    temp_file=$(mktemp)

    jq '.pauseRequested = true' "$AGENT_STATE" > "$temp_file"
    mv "$temp_file" "$AGENT_STATE"

    log "Pause requested"
}

# Resume from pause
resume() {
    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
        return 1
    fi

    local temp_file
    temp_file=$(mktemp)

    jq '.pauseRequested = false | .state = "executing"' "$AGENT_STATE" > "$temp_file"
    mv "$temp_file" "$AGENT_STATE"

    log "Resumed from pause"
}

# Request stop
request_stop() {
    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
        return 1
    fi

    local temp_file
    temp_file=$(mktemp)

    jq '.stopRequested = true' "$AGENT_STATE" > "$temp_file"
    mv "$temp_file" "$AGENT_STATE"

    log "Stop requested"
}

# Complete agent
complete_agent() {
    local result="${1:-success}"
    local summary="${2:-}"

    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
        return 1
    fi

    local temp_file
    temp_file=$(mktemp)

    local timestamp
    timestamp=$(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ)

    local goal
    goal=$(jq -r '.goal' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "")

    local iteration
    iteration=$(jq -r '.iteration' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "0")

    local tool_count
    tool_count=$(jq '.toolCalls | length' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "0")

    local success_count
    success_count=$(jq '[.toolCalls[] | select(.status == "success")] | length' "$AGENT_STATE" 2>/dev/null || echo "0")

    jq --arg result "$result" \
       --arg summary "$summary" \
       --arg ts "$timestamp" \
       '
       .state = "completed" |
       .result = $result |
       .summary = $summary |
       .completedAt = $ts |
       .totalDuration = (
           (($ts | fromdate) - (.startedAt | fromdate)) | floor
       )
       ' "$AGENT_STATE" > "$temp_file"

    mv "$temp_file" "$AGENT_STATE"

    log "Agent completed: $result"

    # Record to memory
    if [[ -x "$MEMORY_MANAGER" ]]; then
        # Record episode
        local details="iterations=$iteration, tools=$tool_count, success=$success_count"
        memory_record_success "task_complete" "$goal" "$details"

        # Create reflection
        local reflection_content="Completed: $goal. Used $tool_count tools across $iteration iterations. Result: $result"
        memory_reflect "progress" "$reflection_content" "$summary"

        # Clear working memory for next task
        "$MEMORY_MANAGER" clear-working 2>/dev/null
    fi
}

# Get agent status
get_status() {
    if [[ -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
        jq '.' "$AGENT_STATE"
    else
        echo '{"state":"no_agent"}'
    fi
}

# Get execution summary
get_summary() {
    if [[ ! -f "$AGENT_STATE" ]]; then
        echo "No active agent"
        return
    fi

    jq -r '
        "=== Agent Status ===\n" +
        "Goal: \(.goal)\n" +
        "State: \(.state)\n" +
        "Iteration: \(.iteration)/\(.maxIterations)\n" +
        "Failures: \(.consecutiveFailures)\n" +
        "Tool Calls: \(.toolCalls | length)\n" +
        "Successful Tools: \([.toolCalls[] | select(.status == "success")] | length)\n" +
        "Duration: \(if .completedAt then .totalDuration else "running" end)\n"
    ' "$AGENT_STATE"
}

# =============================================================================
# COMMAND INTERFACE
# =============================================================================

case "${1:-help}" in
    start)
        start_agent "${2:-goal}" "${3:-}"
        ;;
    transition)
        transition_state "${2:-executing}" "${3:-}"
        ;;
    should-continue)
        should_continue
        ;;
    iterate)
        increment_iteration
        ;;
    failure)
        record_failure "${2:-unknown}"
        ;;
    success)
        record_success "${2:-success}"
        ;;
    execute)
        tool_name="${2:-shell}"
        shift 2 2>/dev/null || shift 1
        execute_tool "$tool_name" "$@"
        ;;
    on-start)
        on_loop_start
        ;;
    on-end)
        on_loop_end
        ;;
    pause)
        request_pause
        ;;
    resume)
        resume
        ;;
    stop)
        request_stop
        ;;
    complete)
        complete_agent "${2:-success}" "${3:-}"
        ;;
    status)
        get_status
        ;;
    summary)
        get_summary
        ;;

    # Memory commands
    memory-init)
        memory_init
        ;;
    memory-context)
        memory_retrieve_context "${2:-}" "${3:-5}"
        ;;
    memory-patterns)
        memory_find_patterns "${2:-}" "${3:-3}"
        ;;
    memory-learn)
        memory_learn_pattern "${2:-workflow}" "${3:-}" "${4:-}" "${5:-1.0}"
        ;;
    memory-record)
        memory_record_success "${2:-task}" "${3:-}" "${4:-}"
        ;;
    memory-reflect)
        memory_reflect "${2:-progress}" "${3:-}" "${4:-}"
        ;;
    memory-stats)
        memory_stats
        ;;

    help|*)
        echo "Agent Loop - Autonomous Execution System"
        echo ""
        echo "Usage: $0 <command> [args]"
        echo ""
        echo "Lifecycle Commands:"
        echo "  start <goal> [context]      - Start new agent"
        echo "  transition <state> [reason] - Change agent state"
        echo "  complete <result> [summary] - Complete agent"
        echo ""
        echo "Loop Control:"
        echo "  should-continue             - Check if loop should continue"
        echo "  iterate                     - Increment iteration counter"
        echo "  failure <error>             - Record a failure"
        echo "  success <result>            - Record a success"
        echo "  pause                       - Request pause"
        echo "  resume                      - Resume from pause"
        echo "  stop                        - Request stop"
        echo ""
        echo "Tool Execution:"
        echo "  execute <tool> [args...]    - Execute a tool"
        echo "    Tools: read_file, search_code, run_tests, lint_code, typecheck, shell"
        echo ""
        echo "Hooks:"
        echo "  on-start                    - Call at loop start"
        echo "  on-end                      - Call at loop end"
        echo ""
        echo "Status:"
        echo "  status                      - Get full status JSON"
        echo "  summary                     - Get human-readable summary"
        echo ""
        echo "Memory Integration:"
        echo "  memory-init                 - Initialize memory system"
        echo "  memory-context <query>      - Retrieve relevant memories"
        echo "  memory-patterns <query>     - Find known patterns"
        echo "  memory-learn <type> <trigger> <solution>"
        echo "                              - Learn a new pattern"
        echo "  memory-record <type> <desc> - Record to memory"
        echo "  memory-reflect <focus> <content>"
        echo "                              - Create reflection"
        echo "  memory-stats                - Get memory statistics"
        ;;
esac

content.content:
1â†’#!/bin/bash
     2â†’# Central Coordinator - Orchestrates all autonomous systems
     3â†’# The intelligence layer that connects everything
     4â†’
     5â†’set -uo pipefail
     6â†’
     7â†’COORD_DIR="${HOME}/.claude/coordination"
     8â†’COORD_STATE="$COORD_DIR/state.json"
     9â†’EXECUTION_LOG="$COORD_DIR/execution.log"
    10â†’LOG_FILE="${HOME}/.claude/coordinator.log"
    11â†’
    12â†’# All integrated hooks (Phase 1-3 - Existing)
    13â†’ORCHESTRATOR="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/autonomous-orchestrator-v2.sh"
    14â†’AGENT_LOOP="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/agent-loop.sh"
    15â†’LEARNING_ENGINE="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/learning-engine.sh"

    24â†’THINKING_FRAMEWORK="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/thinking-framework.sh"
    25â†’MEMORY_MANAGER="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/memory-manager.sh"
    26â†’ERROR_HANDLER="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/error-handler.sh"
    27â†’PLAN_EXECUTE="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/plan-execute.sh"
    28â†’TASK_QUEUE="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/task-queue.sh"
    29â†’
    30â†’# New integrated hooks (10 Advanced Features)
    31â†’REASONING_MODE_SWITCHER="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/reasoning-mode-switcher.sh"
    32â†’BOUNDED_AUTONOMY="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/bounded-autonomy.sh"
    33â†’TREE_OF_THOUGHTS="${HOME}/.claude/hooks/tree-of-thoughts.sh"
